meanings.sent1: The myrrhy incense filled the room with a rich, exotic aroma.
meanings.sent2: The myrrhy perfume reminded her of ancient temples and rituals.
meanings.sent3: The myrrhy candle was so strong that it made the whole house smell like a mysterious forest.
meanings.sent4: The myrrhy taste of the dish transported him to a distant land of spices and incense.
meanings.sent5: The myrrhy essence lingered in the air, creating an atmosphere of tranquility and warmth.

meanings.definition: Having the scent or flavor of myrrh.
meanings.sent1: The myrrhy oil added a unique and exotic touch to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: The myrrhy aroma of the incense brought back memories of ancient rituals.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his myrrhy cologne made him smell like a wise old sage.
meanings.sent4: The myrrhy flavor of the tea was both soothing and invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The myrrhy scent of the flowers filled the room with a sense of mystery and intrigue.
